snippet: Juan Martin del Potro's summer renaissance continued on Monday as the unseeded Argentine advanced into the U.S. Open quarter-finals when Austrian eighth seed Dominic Thiem quit their match with an injury....
lead_paragraph: Juan Martin del Potro's summer renaissance continued on Monday as the unseeded Argentine advanced into the U.S. Open quarter-finals when Austrian eighth seed Dominic Thiem quit their match with an injury.

headline.print_headline: Del Potro Into U.S. Open Quarters After Thiem Retires
headline.main: Del Potro Into U.S. Open Quarters After Thiem Retires
